channel.title: My FIRST scar script

item.title: My FIRST scar script
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

O that is a usual mistake for beginers,
sendkeys just types it out but doesnt send it, so you need to use a enter button.

this is the way you do it,
sendkeys(Message1 + Chr(13))

So your script should look like this.

//edwards auto spammer
//instructions
//highlight type your message here and replace with what you want it to say
//change wait to what you want
//target rs window
//press start and your off
program script;

const
Message1='type your message here';

procedure hello;
begin     //wait acts in milliseconds
wait(1000)//change this number for a shorter or longer pause
sendkeys(Message1 + Chr(13));
end;


begin
repeat
hello;
until(false);
End.
{::::::::::
 :: eggy ::
 ::::::::::}

Anyways good luck scripting.

item.title: My FIRST scar script
item.dc:creator: @eggy0095 eggy0095
item.description:
@eggy0095 wrote:

hey this is my first script i made on my own (without advice) its a spammer for world 1 and 2 here it is

[code]
//edwards auto spammer
//instructions
//highlight type your message here and replace with what you want it to say
//change wait to what you want
//target rs window
//press start and your off
program script;

const
Message1=‘type your message here’;

procedure hello;
begin //wait acts in milliseconds
wait(1000)//change this number for a shorter or longer pause
sendkeys(Message1);
end;

begin
repeat
hello;
until(false);
End.
{::::::::::
:: eggy ::
::::::::::} bt wam i suppsoed to use code tags? [glow=black,2,300]~eggy~[/glow][/code]
